desc: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.
lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
name: shredder_whirling_death

desc: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
name: shredder_timber_chain

attrib:
BONUS ARMOR: 1
BONUS HP REGEN: 1
MAX STACKS: 4 / 8 / 12 / 16
STACK DURATION: 16 / 16 / 16 / 16
desc: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.
lore: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
name: shredder_reactive_armor

attrib:

PASS DAMAGE: 100 / 140 / 180
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 / 75 / 100
SLOW: 5%
MANA COST PER SECOND: 20 / 25 / 30
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/150/200
COOLDOWN: 8
desc:
Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away. Scepter grants Timbersaw a second Chakram.
name: shredder_chakram

cmb: COOLDOWN: 0
name: shredder_return_chakram
